languages.text: Оскверненный урожай с Януса был искоренен из агрочасовен Футфола, но сохранился в подпольных рассадниках. Голодающие люди готовы были на преступление ради горсти еды, а уж тем более — ради глотка забродившего ротгата. Незаконная выпивка, изготовленная из плодов Януса, разжигала в сердцах простолюдинов дурную злобу и жажду насилия, вызывая к жизни беспорядки и наихудшие пороки, свойственные черни.

The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, or even a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus sparked sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of the peasantry, spawning riots and stirring up the worst vices of the common folk.
languages.original_text: Оскверненный урожай с Януса был искоренен из агрочасовен Футфола, но сохранился в подпольных рассадниках. Голодающие люди готовы были на преступление ради горсти еды, а уж тем более — ради глотка забродившего ротгата. Незаконная выпивка, изготовленная из плодов Януса, разжигала в сердцах простолюдинов дурную злобу и жажду насилия, вызывая к жизни беспорядки и наихудшие пороки, свойственные черни.

traits.locale_text: The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated in the Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit crimes for a palmful of food, let alone the sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus stirred sinister anger and thirst for violence in the hearts of common people and spawned riots and the worst of sins that were in the rabble's nature.

The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated in the Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit crimes for a palmful of food, let alone the sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus stirred sinister anger and thirst for violence in the hearts of common people and spawned riots and the worst of sins that were in the rabble's nature.

The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, let alone a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus stirred sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of commoners, spawning riots and hideous crimes against nature.

The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, let alone a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus stirred sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of commoners, spawning riots and hideous crimes against nature.

The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, or even a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus sparked sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of the peasantry, spawning riots and stirring up the worst vices of the common folk.

The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, or even a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus sparked sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of the peasantry, spawning riots and stirring up the worst vices of the common folk.

languages.text: 绝大部分来自加努斯的腐化作物已经从落脚港的农业教堂中被根除，但仍有一些保留在地下苗圃中。由于饥荒，哪怕仅仅是为了一丁点粮食，落脚港的人们就能做出令人发指的行为，更不用说能喝上一口发酵的烈酒了。用加努斯水果制成的非法饮料激起了平民心中邪恶的愤怒和对暴力的渴望，继而引发了暴乱与灭绝人性的可怕犯罪。
languages.original_text: The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, or even a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus sparked sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of the peasantry, spawning riots and stirring up the worst vices of the common folk.

traits.locale_text: 绝大部分来自加努斯的腐化作物已经从落脚港的农业教堂中被根除，但仍有一些保留在地下苗圃中。只要一丁点这样的粮食，就能让落脚港的人们做出令人发指的行为，更不用说喝上一口发酵的烈酒了。用加努斯水果制成的非法饮料激起了平民心中邪恶的愤怒和对暴力的渴望，继而引发了暴乱与灭绝人性的可怕犯罪。

languages.text: Die verderbte Ernte von Janus wurde in den Agro-Kapellen von Footfall getilgt, doch ein Teil davon verblieb in unterirdischen Pflanzschulen. Die verhungernden Bewohner waren für eine Handvoll Essen zu schändlichsten Taten bereit, ja selbst für einen Schluck fermentierten Fusel. Illegale Getränke, die aus den Früchten von Janus hergestellt wurden, lösten in den Herzen des Pöbels eine finstere Wut und eine Begierde nach Gewalt aus. Das führte zu liederlichsten Lastern und gewalttätigen Unruhen.
languages.original_text: The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, or even a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus sparked sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of the peasantry, spawning riots and stirring up the worst vices of the common folk.

traits.locale_text: Die verderbte Ernte von Janus wurde in den Agro-Kapellen von Footfall getilgt, doch ein Teil davon verblieb in unterirdischen Pflanzschulen. Die verhungernden Bewohner waren für eine Handvoll Essen zu schändlichsten Taten bereit, und für einen Schluck Fusel erst recht. Illegale Getränke, die aus den Früchten von Janus hergestellt wurden, lösten in den Herzen des Pöbels eine finstere Wut und eine Begierde nach Gewalt aus. Aufstände und schreckliche Verbrechen wider jede Natur waren die Folge.

languages.text: Les cultures corrompues de Janus furent détruites dans les agrochapelles de Castel, mais certains continuèrent à les cultiver dans des exploitations clandestines. Les affamés étaient prêts à commettre les pires atrocités en échange d'une bouchée de nourriture, ou même d'une gorgée de tord-boyaux. Les boissons illégales à base de fruits fermentés de Janus firent naître une rage sinistre et une soif de violence dans le cœur de la paysannerie, engendrant des émeutes et favorisant les pires réactions parmi la population.
languages.original_text: The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, or even a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus sparked sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of the peasantry, spawning riots and stirring up the worst vices of the common folk.

traits.locale_text: Les cultures corrompues de Janus furent détruites dans les agrochapelles de Castel, mais certains continuèrent à les cultiver dans des exploitations clandestines. Les affamés étaient prêts à commettre les pires atrocités en échange d'une bouchée de nourriture, et plus encore pour une gorgée de tord-boyaux. Les boissons illégales à base de fruits fermentés de Janus firent naître une rage sinistre et une soif de violence dans le cœur des roturiers, engendrant des émeutes et des crimes abominables.

languages.text: La cosecha corrupta de Janus se erradicó de las agrocapillas de Paso, pero parte de ella permaneció en los viveros subterráneos. La gente hambrienta estaba dispuesta a cometer actos inenarrables por un puñado de comida, o incluso por un trago de licor. Las bebidas ilegales elaboradas con las frutas de Janus despertaron una furia siniestra y un ansia de violencia en los corazones de los plebeyos, lo que dio lugar a disturbios y desató sus vicios más oscuros.
languages.original_text: The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, or even a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus sparked sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of the peasantry, spawning riots and stirring up the worst vices of the common folk.

traits.locale_text: La cosecha corrupta de Janus se erradicó de las agrocapillas de Paso, pero parte de ella permaneció en los viveros subterráneos. La gente hambrienta estaba dispuesta a cometer actos inenarrables por un puñado de comida, por no hablar de un trago de licor. Las bebidas ilegales elaboradas con las frutas de Janus despertaron una furia siniestra y un ansia de violencia en los corazones de los plebeyos, lo que dio lugar a disturbios y espantosos crímenes contra la naturaleza.

languages.text: ヤヌスからの腐敗した収穫物はフットフォールのアグロチャペルからは根絶されたが、一部は地下の苗床に残っていた。飢えた人々は発酵した安酒一口はおろか、一握りの食料のためであっても凶悪な行為を犯す覚悟ができていた。ヤヌスの果実から作られた違法な飲み物は、庶民の心に邪悪な怒りと暴力への渇望を呼び起こし、彼ら中にある最悪の悪癖をかき立てた。
languages.original_text: The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, or even a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus sparked sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of the peasantry, spawning riots and stirring up the worst vices of the common folk.

traits.locale_text: ヤヌスからの腐敗した収穫物はフットフォールのアグロチャペルからは根絶されたが、一部は地下の苗床に残っていた。飢えた人々は発酵した安酒一口はおろか、一握りの食料のためであっても凶悪な行為を犯す覚悟ができていた。ヤヌスの果実から作られた違法な飲み物は、庶民の心に邪悪な怒りと暴力への渇望を呼び起こし、彼ら中にある最悪の悪癖をかき立てた。

languages.text: Janus'tan gelen yozlaşmış ekinler, Binliman'ın tarım şapellerinde yok edilirken bir kısmı yer altındaki bakımevlerinde kaldı. Açlıktan ölenler bir avuç yiyecek, hatta bir yudum fermente groksöldüren için suç işlemeye hazırdı. Janus'un meyvelerinden yapılma yasa dışı içecekler, köylülerin kalbinde uğursuz bir öfkeye ve vahşet arzusuna yol açıyor, isyanlara neden oluyor, sıradan halkın en kötü taraflarını gün yüzüne çıkarıyordu.
languages.original_text: The corrupted harvest from Janus was eradicated from Footfall's agro-chapels, but some of it remained in underground nurseries. The starving were ready to commit heinous acts for a handful of food, or even a sip of fermented rotgut. Illegal drinks made from the fruits of Janus sparked sinister rage and a thirst for violence in the hearts of the peasantry, spawning riots and stirring up the worst vices of the common folk.

traits.locale_text: Janus'tan gelen yozlaşmış ekinler, Binliman'ın tarım şapellerinde yok edildi ancak bir kısmı yeraltı bakımevlerinde kaldı. Açlıktan ölenler bir avuç yiyecek, hatta bir yudum fermente groksöldüren için suç işlemeye hazırdılar. Janus'un meyvelerinden yapılma yasa dışı içecekler, köylülerin kalbinde uğursuz bir öfkeye ve vahşet arzusuna yol açıyor, isyanlara neden oluyor, sıradan halkın içindeki en kötü tarafları gün yüzüne çıkarıyordu.
